whatIsAidaki.question: What is AIDAKI?
whatIsAidaki.answer: AIDAKI is a specialized e-learning platform for Algerian baccalaureate students. It offers complete courses, interactive videos, summaries, quizzes, and personalized tracking through artificial intelligence.

whoCanUse.question: Who can use AIDAKI?
whoCanUse.answer:
Final year students of all specializations, and their parents who wish to follow their progress.

ℹ️ We are currently working on integrating other levels: 2nd year secondary (2AS), 1st year secondary (1AS) and Middle School Certificate (BEM). They will be available soon.

howAiHelps.question: How does artificial intelligence help me learn?
howAiHelps.answer: AIDAKI's AI analyzes your results, detects your strengths and weaknesses, and recommends the courses and exercises most suited to your profile. It guides you to make your learning journey structured and personalized.

whatContains.question: What does the AIDAKI platform contain?
whatContains.answer:
AIDAKI offers:
• Complete courses compliant with the Algerian national curriculum
• Clear and downloadable summaries
• Dynamic educational videos
• An intelligent chatbot capable of answering questions in real time
• Interactive quizzes to assess your knowledge
• An analysis dashboard that identifies your strengths and weaknesses
• Tutoring sessions and video conferences with teachers
• A Latest news in education section
• Parent access to track student progress

nationalProgram.question: Is the platform compliant with the Algerian national curriculum?
nationalProgram.answer: Yes, all our content faithfully follows the official curriculum of the Ministry of National Education.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: Yes. We offer a free 72-hour plan allowing you to test the platform before switching to a paid subscription to access all features.

installSoftware.question: Do I need to install software to use AIDAKI?
installSoftware.answer:
No. AIDAKI works directly from a browser on computer, tablet or smartphone.

➡️ We also have a mobile application. Click here to download it: Download the app

pricing.question: What are the prices and payment methods?
pricing.answer:
We offer several plans, free and paid, according to your needs.

You can pay for your subscription in two ways:
• Scratch card available in our partner stores. Click here to see the list of points of sale: See stores
• Secure online payment via CIB card.

Click here to see our plans and choose yours: See plans

mobileUse.question: Can I use AIDAKI from my phone?
mobileUse.answer: Yes, the platform is 100% mobile and tablet compatible.

coursesAvailable.question: Are courses available continuously?
coursesAvailable.answer: Yes. You can access courses at any time, 24/7.

progressTracking.question: How does progress tracking work?
progressTracking.answer: Our dashboard analyzes your results and shows you your strengths and areas to improve, with personalized recommendations.

support.question: Is assistance available if I have a problem?
support.answer: Yes. You can contact our technical support directly from your account or by email.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: Discover our vision and innovation in educational technology

nav.effectOfAvatars: The Impact of Avatars on the Human Brain
nav.newEducationalApproach: A New Educational Approach: Our Math and Physics Courses Developed with Python

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.subtitle: The future of education starts now
vision.intro: We don't just teach: we bring a new approach to tomorrow's education by radically transforming how each individual learns and progresses.
vision.personalizedLearning: Every learner deserves tailor-made education. Our AI analyzes, anticipates, and adapts learning in real-time, creating pathways that instantly adjust to each student's unique needs. Gone are the days of uniform learning: our intelligent ecosystem unleashes each learner's unique potential.
vision.predictiveAnalysis: Imagine a world where AI perfectly understands how you learn, anticipates your challenges, and boosts your strengths. Through cutting-edge predictive analysis, we multiply performance, democratize access, and transform lives, one by one. Where every pathway is unique, every success becomes predictable.
vision.personalizedReality: Personalized education is no longer a dream, it's our reality. We're not reinventing school: we're creating tomorrow's educational ecosystem, where every learner benefits from a customized experience that maximizes their potential in an ever-evolving world.

aboutUs.paragrah1: The AIDAKI platform is a 100% Algerian innovation, developed by an Algerian company by young Algerian engineers with passion and a clear vision to advance the education sector in our country. Through this platform, we aim to provide a modern solution that meets the aspirations of the new generation, combining cutting-edge technology and artificial intelligence to serve students at all levels.
aboutUs.paragrah2br: Our next-generation intelligent educational platform, powered by artificial intelligence, utilizes an advanced recommendation system to create personalized learning pathways tailored to each student's unique educational needs.
aboutUs.paragrah2: This system ensures the development of essential skills and concepts to achieve optimal growth. The pathways feature intelligent playlists containing high-quality educational resources, meticulously designed using AI algorithms to address individual learning challenges.
aboutUs.paragrah3: Additionally, our platform provides targeted practice opportunities, specialized guidance, instant feedback, and intelligent progressive support that empowers every student to achieve significant and meaningful progress.

avatarTechnology.title: The Impact of Avatars on the Human Brain
avatarTechnology.intro: The impact of avatar teachers on the human brain represents an emerging and fascinating research field that combines cognitive neuroscience and educational technologies.
avatarTechnology.neuralNetworks: When we interact with an avatar teacher, our brain activates the same neural networks that operate during real social interactions. The superior temporal cortex and regions involved in theory of mind become active, allowing us to attribute pedagogical intentions to the avatar.
avatarTechnology.engagement: 70% of learners affirm that interaction with AI technologies makes their courses more engaging. The avatar teacher can adapt to each learner's cognitive pace, thus optimizing neuroplasticity.
avatarTechnology.stressReduction: Unlike a human teacher, the avatar does not generate social stress, allowing the prefrontal cortex to focus entirely on cognitive learning processes rather than anxiety management. This stress reduction promotes an optimal mental state for acquiring new knowledge.
avatarTechnology.rewardSystem: Avatar teachers can trigger dopamine release in the brain's reward circuit through immediate and positive feedback. This stimulation of the ventral striatum reinforces intrinsic motivation and facilitates information encoding in long-term memory.
avatarTechnology.multimodalIntegration: An avatar teacher combines visual, auditory, and sometimes gestural stimuli, simultaneously activating multiple cortical areas. This multimodal integration at the superior parietal cortex level enriches memory traces and improves information retention.
avatarTechnology.adaptiveTeaching: The avatar can adapt its pedagogical strategies in real-time according to the learner's neurological reactions, thus optimizing teaching effectiveness. This technology potentially revolutionizes education by creating adaptive learning environments that respect the constraints and opportunities of our brain architecture.

platform.title: Next-Generation AI-Powered Educational Platform
platform.intro: Our cutting-edge educational platform, powered by artificial intelligence, relies on an intelligent recommendation system to create personalized learning pathways that align with each student's unique educational needs.
platform.systemAdvanced: This advanced system ensures the development of skills and concepts necessary to achieve maximum growth. The pathways contain smart playlists featuring high-quality educational resources, specifically designed using advanced AI algorithms to address individual challenges.
platform.features: Our pioneering platform also provides opportunities for targeted practice, specialized instruction, immediate feedback, and intelligent progressive support that helps each student achieve remarkable and effective progress.

leadership.title: Our Vision in Educational Leadership
leadership.commitment: We are driven by our deep commitment to comprehensive human capacity development, positioning ourselves at the forefront of the contemporary educational revolution.
leadership.redesigning: We redesign learning environments by integrating cutting-edge artificial intelligence technologies and advanced technological solutions to create transformative and impactful educational experiences.
leadership.research: Our pioneering research focuses on addressing fundamental educational challenges using rigorous and evidence-based scientific methodologies. We build robust bridges between the latest discoveries in learning and cognitive sciences and the development of revolutionary platforms and tools that redefine the concept of effective learning.
leadership.measurement: We also meticulously measure the impact of our innovations on all stakeholders in the educational ecosystem, from learners and educators to institutions.
leadership.thoughtLeadership: This integrated research approach solidifies our position as thought leaders in shaping the future of education, where we lead positive change and radically influence the development of educational systems and the educational artificial intelligence industry.

coursesDevelopment.title: A New Educational Approach: Our Math and Physics Courses Developed with Python
coursesDevelopment.intro: In a world where technology is constantly reshaping education, our platform offers a groundbreaking way to teach exact sciences.
coursesDevelopment.qualityContent: Each course is the result of weeks of intensive development, blending educational expertise with cutting-edge technology. Our mission is to make complex concepts clear, engaging, and accessible.
coursesDevelopment.pythonAdvantage: By leveraging Python, we bring theory to life through dynamic visualizations, interactive simulations, and real-world applications. Learners can manipulate variables, observe real-time results, and develop a deeper, more intuitive understanding of scientific concepts.
coursesDevelopment.intelligentAvatars: Our avatars are much more than digital presenters — they create a genuine connection with learners. Present throughout each course, they explain, clarify when needed, and keep learners motivated from start to finish.
coursesDevelopment.uniqueOffering: Few platforms combine this level of technical innovation with academic rigor. Our vision is clear: to make high-quality science education accessible to everyone, no matter where they are.
coursesDevelopment.realImpact: Feedback from our users confirms the effectiveness of our approach: abstract concepts become concrete, understanding improves, and engagement increases. What once felt difficult now feels doable.
coursesDevelopment.futureEducation: This new educational dynamic opens exciting possibilities for 21st-century learning, where technology becomes a true partner in academic success.

faq.title: Help and Support
faq.subtitle: Help & Support Page – AIDAKI
faq.welcome: Welcome to the AIDAKI platform, your intelligent learning space.
faq.description: Here is a comprehensive guide to easily navigate the platform and fully enjoy all its features.
faq.helpDescription: Here is a simple guide to help you use each section of the AIDAKI platform effectively.
faq.contactDescription: Contact us by email: education@aiunivers.ai or call XXXX-XXX-XXX

faqs.question: I can't find my courses, what should I do?
faqs.answer: Make sure you are properly logged into your account. Then click on "My Learning" in the left menu. All the modules for your course specialty are there, organized by subject. You can also use the search bar at the top of the page to type the course name.

faqs.question: How do I see my lessons that I've already started?
faqs.answer: When you are in "My Learning", look at the progress percentage on each module card. Click on the module (e.g., Mathematics) then press "Continue" to resume the last lesson where you left off.

faqs.question: Where is the history of my conversations with the chatbot?
faqs.answer: To see your previous exchanges with the intelligent assistant, go to the "My Assistant" section. You will find a list of your previous conversations organized by subject with the possibility to re-read them or continue the discussion.

faqs.question: How do I know if I have completed a module?
faqs.answer: In the "My Learning" section, each module displays a progress percentage. When it reaches 100%, it means you have completed all the lessons and quizzes in the module. You can review the content at any time if you want to revise.

faqs.question: Where can I track my overall progress?
faqs.answer: Go to "My Progress" which represents a personalized tracking space. It allows you to see at a glance: Your progress in each subject, Quizzes passed and those to redo, The time you spend studying, Your strengths and concepts to work on.

faqs.question: What is a video with avatar?
faqs.answer: A video with avatar is a lesson where an animated character (avatar) represents your teacher and explains the course to you in a clear and interactive way. Most of these avatars are designed from your real teachers, to offer you an experience closer to reality, but with the flexibility of digital.

faqs.question: How do I ask a question to a teacher?
faqs.answer: In each lesson, a "Notes" button is available. Write your question clearly, and you will receive an answer as soon as possible.

faqs.question: I'm not receiving notifications or reminders, what should I do?
faqs.answer: Click on your first name (top right). Make sure notifications are enabled, and that your email address is correct.

faqs.question: How do I change the platform language?
faqs.answer: Click on the language button at the top right to change the interface language. You can choose Arabic, French, or English, according to your preference.

faqs.question: What should I do if I encounter a bug or error?
faqs.answer: Try refreshing the page or logging out/logging back in. If that doesn't work, contact us by email: education@aiunivers.ai or call XXXX-XXX-XXX

header.title: Change the way you learn now
header.description: AIDAKI is an e-learning platform that brings together all courses from the Algerian national curriculum. It offers clear summaries, avatar-animated videos, interactive quizzes, an assistance chatbot, and an intelligent dashboard to track and improve performance.
header.speechBubble1: Hello, I am your personal assistant
header.speechBubble2: All courses are available with audio and video

feature1.title: Video content summaries
feature1.description: We provide video summaries of content, allowing you to understand main ideas faster and better absorb subjects through visual learning.

feature2.title: Written summaries
feature2.description: We provide written summaries detailing the main elements, providing an educational resource and helping you focus on essential content without having to review everything.

feature3.title: Complete courses with explanation
feature3.description: We provide complete courses with explanation, allowing you to better absorb content by combining visual and explanatory learning, and enabling students and teachers to interact with educational material optimally.

feature4.title: Quiz system
feature4.description: We provide a dedicated quiz system, allowing you to assess your level and track your progress regularly, while evaluating the learning from each lesson.

feature5.title: Interactive discussion system
feature5.description: We provide an interactive discussion and debate system, allowing you to communicate, ask questions, discuss and get direct answers, improving your educational experience and helping you better understand the content.

feature6.title: Dashboard with Progress Status
feature6.description: We provide you with a comprehensive dashboard displaying progress status, enabling you to track your achievements and monitor your development in a clear and organized manner to reach your goals effectively

brand.description: AIDAKI is the modern educational platform that helps students from elementary to high school succeed in their academic journey with innovative tools and personalized learning experiences.

support.title: Support and assistance
support.subtitle: Integrated support system
support.complaint_description: Submit an official complaint regarding a service or situation
support.report_description: Report a problem, incident, or concerning situation
support.paragraph1: We offer a comprehensive support and assistance system aimed at improving the student's learning experience. Students can ask questions to qualified teachers, allowing them to get immediate and clear answers to any confusion they might encounter in school subjects.
support.paragraph2: Additionally, we organize interactive sessions via the Zoom application, where students can join live classes with academic teachers. These sessions allow them to interact directly, ask questions and discuss complex topics in depth.
support.paragraph3: We believe that direct interaction with teachers contributes to improving understanding and strengthens students' confidence, helping them effectively achieve their academic goals.

quiz.completedDescription: Congratulations! You have successfully completed the quiz.
quiz.title: Comprehension Quiz
quiz.description: Test your knowledge with this interactive quiz

1.question: What is the best method for effectively retaining course information?
1.explanation: Spaced repetition and regular practice are the most effective methods for long-term memorization.

2.question: It is recommended to take regular breaks during study to maintain concentration.
2.explanation: Regular breaks help maintain concentration and prevent mental fatigue.

3.question: Which of these learning techniques is the most active?
3.explanation: Explaining to someone else engages multiple cognitive processes and strengthens understanding.

4.question: Which environment is most conducive to learning?
4.explanation: A quiet, organized environment allows for better concentration and reduces distractions.

5.question: It is better to study multiple different subjects at the same time in one session.
5.explanation: It is generally more effective to focus on one subject at a time to avoid confusion.

welcome.generalDescription: General mode activated! You can now ask me questions about any topic, not just specific lessons.
